item.title: Part I
item.description: Game Series Part I InfoPremiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels… This event has ended on November 11th, 2021. You can find a recording of the event here!

item.title: Part II
item.description: Game Series Part II InfoPremiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels… This event has ended on December 2nd, 2021. You can find a recording of the event here!

item.title: Part III
item.description: Game Series Part III Coming to WLMAC on December 16th, 2021!Premiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels…

item.title: Leaderboard
item.description: InfoParticipate to earn GAME DEV POINTS, which will award you with a surprise during the Game Jam! Each participation will be worth 200 points, with winners of the special challenges earning an extra 100 points per challenge. Rank Name Part I Part II Part III Total Points 1 MuteMini 200 +100 300 1 MarsFlat 200 +100 300 1 Luka Jovanovic 200 +100 300 1 BattleMage_ 200 +100 300 1 AZron 200 +100 300 1 Chelsea Wong 200 +100 300 7 Michael C 200 +90 290 7 Ryan Atlas 200 +90 290 9 RedWiz 200 +60 260 9 Maplefin 200 +60 260 9 alexa 200 +60 260 12 Lost_Cactus 200 +50 250 13 lukas142434 200 +20 220 13 C.
